'''Cuitztli''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

Cuitztli is a talented herbalist and florist, who runs the flower and herb shop in the prestigious Periki's Overlook district. She believes the decision to let her open a shop in the city was deliberate, allowing her plenty of clients and sending a message of cosmopolitan refinement to visitors.
